abstract: P. R. Rosenbaum received his PhD in Statistics from Harvard University in 1980. Since 1986, he has been in the Statistics Department of the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania. He is a fellow of the American Statistical Association and he received the George W. Snedecor Award from the Committee of Presidents of Statistical Societies.
meta: In book: International Encyclopedia of Education (pp.354-359)
